needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text:
According to the text, the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza are:

1. A high-quality "crust" made from whole wheat flour.
2. A "sweet" sauce that is not based on refined sugar.
3. A blend of natural ingredients such as oregano, garlic, and basil.

The text notes that these ingredients work well together, and that there is a limit to how far you can push the combination, which is why larger companies often don't have the freedom to experiment and innovate as much as small companies do.
